subject: Sailboats and Sailing
organizations: San Franciscos Golden Gate Yacht Club
lead_paragraph: San Francisco’s Golden Gate Yacht Club decided Monday to take its chances with a last-ditch appeal in a New York court rather than meet next week’s deadline for entering the next America’s Cup. The club, which backs the software tycoon Larry Ellison’s sailing team, BMW Oracle Racing, has been in court for more than a year fighting the two-time defending America’s Cup champion Alinghi of Switzerland over what it says are unfair rules for the next regatta.
